RegistrationCredentialsStepComponent.FORM_INSTRUCTIONS_CREDENTIALS: These are the login credentials you'll use to manage your account online, as well as to listen on the SXM App.

ERRORS.ALREADY_EXIST: That username/email is associated with another account.

ERRORS.LENGTH: Your password must be {{ min }} to {{ max }} characters long.
ERRORS.POLICY: Your password must contain at least one character from at least 3 different groups, as explained in our password policy.
ERRORS.GENERIC: Your password does not fulfill all the requirements
ERRORS.PII_DATA: Password cannot contain first name, last name or email address.

RegistrationCredentialsStepComponent.SYSTEM_ERROR: We’re sorry… something went wrong. We’re experiencing technical issues and are working on resolving it. Please try again.

RegistrationSecurityQuestionsStepCompone.FORM_INSTRUCTIONS_SECURITY_QUESTIONS: Please select and answer three questions below that will help us verify your identity if you forget your password.

RegistrationAddressStepComponent.REGISTRATION_TRANSACTION_DETAILS: Now we just need the following info to set up your subscription so you can start listening.
